Attaching our packages and reading in data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(skimr) #install.packages("skimr")
library(kableExtra) #install.packages("kableExtra")
# read in lobster data
lobsters <- read_xlsx(here("data", "lobsters.xlsx"),
                      skip=4)
```
